department: Public/Parlementaire/ Département du Management Solidaire des Ressources
short_summary: Établir un Fournisseur Premier en Offre de Basse Litiges. Harburger, Walther.
description: To obtain only the information needed, Answer by better understanding the Context
full_summary:
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Pharmaceutical Supplies

**Official Solicitation Number:** WS3695876516 **Publication Date:** May 12, 2023 **Closing Date:** May 12, 2023, 2:00 p.m. **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023 **Expected Contract End Date:** No specified date **Contract Overview** --------------- The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites qualified bidders to submit their proposals for the Standing Offer to supply and distribute a wide range of pharmaceuticals and over-the-counter products across Canada. **Compliance with Trade Agreements** The Standing Offer will be subject to trade agreements, including the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), among others. **Regions of Delivery** The procurement will cover various regions of Canada, including Nunavut Territory, Manitoba, Northwest Territories, Prince Edward Island, Nova Scotia, British Columbia, Ontario (except National Capital Region), New Brunswick, Newfoundland and Labrador, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Quebec (except National Capital Region), and Yukon. **Contracting Entity** The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with a contact person being Eric Vettoretti, who can be reached at eric.vettoretti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. **Notice Type** This solicitation is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Trade Agreements Act, where the contract will be awarded to the lowest priced bidder. **Amendment** This solicitation is not subject to any amendments. **Healthcare Goods** ----------------- The contractor will supply a wide range of pharmaceuticals and over-the-counter products for the benefit of federal departments and agencies across Canada. The procurement will be based on the lowest price-selection criterion. **Documents Issued** ---------------------- Government notices, procurement contracts, and documents released by the Government of Canada comply with accessibility requirements under the Accessible Canada Act. Documents in French are available upon request. Note: Please ensure you follow any necessary formatting and structure requirements specified by your client.
